name: primordially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very basic, or is connected with a very early stage of development: Their songs range from the primordially simple to the extremely complicated. He believes that emotion is primordially human, the foundation of all other experience.
More examplesFewer examplesThe open fire is primordially simple, with meat and other foods cooked on vertical sticks.Trying to find some primordially authentic culture can be like peeling an onion.Primordially, the production of music is a way of creating and maintaining order.
